articles.title: Singapore removes India, 5 other South Asian nations from travel restriction list - The Indian Express
articles.description: All travellers with a 14-day travel history to Bangladesh, India, Myanmar, Nepal, Pakistan and Sri Lanka will be allowed to enter or transit through Singapore from Wednesday, the health ministry said.
